Apple iPad Air

Published on 25 Feb 2019

The Air comes in gold, gray, or silver. A 64GB model costs $499 and a 256GB model costs $649. Adding 4G LTE cellular to either adds $130. The Apple Pencil costs $99, and Apple’s keyboard case costs $159.

Read More

Huawei P30 Pro

Published on 20 Feb 2019

Compared with the Mate 20 Pro, the P30 Pro’s handling of color is slightly less subtle, with skin tones appearing a little richer and fluorescent lights glowing with more aplomb. But the Mate 20 Pro shows a smidge more detail and texture in images.

Read More

BlackBerry Key2 LE

Published on 19 Feb 2019

If you’re a fan of the BlackBerry Key2, you’re in luck: The Key2 LE is almost identical. It comes in at 5.92 by 2.83 by 0.33 inches (HWD) and has the same 4.5-inch display and textured back to provide extra grip. At just 5.5 ounces, it’s a hair lighter than the Key2 (5.93 ounces) thanks to its plastic frame.

Read More
